display.title: Wooden Hammer
display.description: Break a block with a hammer to crush it. Cobblestone -> Gravel, Gravel -> Sand, Sand -> Dust, Netherrack -> Crushed Netherrack, End Stone -> Crushed End Stone, Cobbled Deepslate -> Crushed Deepslate, Blackstone -> Crushed Blackstone. Later, you can automate this process with a crusher from Mekanism. For now, vein mining and construction wands will be your friend. Also, try using compressed hammers (for compressed blocks)!
